items.question: How accurate are the generated subtitles?
items.answer: Our AI model ensures high accuracy, leveraging advanced algorithms for reliable results. While we aim for 95% accuracy, minor edits may be needed for perfection.

items.question: Can I edit the subtitles after generation?
items.answer: Yes! You can easily edit the generated subtitles within our platform before finalizing them for your videos.

items.question: What video formats are supported for subtitle generation?
items.answer: We support various video formats including MP4, AVI, MOV, and others. Just upload your file, and we'll handle the rest.

items.question: Is there language support for subtitles?
items.answer: Absolutely! We offer support for multiple languages. You can choose your desired language at the beginning of the subtitle generation process.

items.question: How long does it take to generate subtitles?
items.answer: Subtitles are generated almost instantaneously. Most videos are processed within minutes, depending on length and complexity.

items.question: What is the pricing model for subtitle generation?
items.answer: We operate on a flexible pay-as-you-go pricing model, ensuring you only pay for what you use. There are no hidden fees or subscriptions.

items.question: Can I use subtitles for commercial purposes?
items.answer: Yes, you hold full rights to use generated subtitles in any commercial setting without additional fees.

items.question: What technical support do you offer?
items.answer: We provide comprehensive technical support including guidelines, FAQs, and 24/7 customer service for troubleshooting and inquiries.
